upload.drag-text: Or drag and drop the file here!
upload.limit-text: CSV Editor supports only 5 files maximum

intro.introApp: This application comes with great looks for edit the CSV. You can find all recent files and use it again on just one click. It also supports multilingual and theme.
intro.easy-to-use-text1: It also comes with all feature provided by
intro.easy-to-use-text2: under the community support. We can rearrange the column, apply sort on any column, apply the filter on the data, also, it supports to Edit/Remove/Add a new record as well.
intro.easy-to-upload-text: CSV Editor can edit up to 5 files at the same. It also comes with drag and drops feature, you can easily drag and drop 5 files OR upload the same file by clicking the upload button.

scv-editor.error-while-saving: An error ocurred updating the file
scv-editor.save-message: The file has been saved successfully.
